project_descr: Strengthening of institutional and legal capacities to enable improvement of the national monitoring system and management of environmental information

outputs.output_descr: To strengthen targeted national capacities to meet Rio Convention objectives through improved procedures and tools to monitor and manage environmental information

document_name: Signature page of the Project Document UNDP-GEF "Strengthening of institutional and legal capacities to enable improvement of the national monitoring system and management of environmental information"

RFP on Development and conduction of the evaluation study of the trends in knowledge/understanding of Rio Conventions among the target groups of pilot programme participants on awareness raising and understanding of environmental Rio Convention
RFP on Piloting of the set of Climate Change related indicators and development of a Road-map to improve climate change-related statistics
RFP on Support the SAEPF in revision of “National Biological Diversity Conservation Priorities of Kyrgyz Republic until 2024
RFP on Support to define national methodology to measure LDN indicators and formulate voluntary SDG 15.3 target
project_title: monitoring system and management of environment info
